set.Description: Set the active channel for pulling cards or raiding. Only one active channel for each setting is allowed.

register.Description: Registers the user to the game. Allowing them to pull cards and interact with the bot.

userinfo.Description: Show a user stats and titles. Sending without paramaters will show your stats.

pull.Description: Draws two random cards to the current channel. Anyone can grab these cards.

release.Description: Release card to gain money and crystals. Sending without paramaters will use your most recently obtained card.

affection.Description: View current affection with that card. Allows you to level up the cards affection and view level up bonuses.

deck.Description: View all cards in your possession.

inventory.Description: View all items in your possession.

iteminfo.Description: Shows the items usage and how to obtain it.

tag.Description: Add a tag to a card you own. You can tag multiple cards at once. A card can only have one tag at a time.

tagcreate.Description: Create a new tag and its emoji. A tag's name can not have any spaces in it.

tagrename.Description: Change a tag's name. A tag's can not have any spaces in it.

tags.Description: View all tags and the amount of cards with each tag.

untag.Description: Remove a tag to a card you own. You can remove card's tags at once.

cooldown.Description: Shows how long you have left on your pull and grab cooldowns.

cardinfo.Description: Shows details about a certial card. Sending without paramaters will use your most recently obtained card.

pokedex.Description: Shows details about a certial card and how to obtain that card. Sending with a pokemon name, you can add a 3rd parameter to set it to that variant of the pokemon. Sending with a series name, it will show all the none holographic/full art in that series and if you have them.

serverinfo.Description: Shows information related to the current server. Shows which channels are used for pulling and raiding.

credits.Description: Shows the credits for the bot.

wishlist.Description: Shows all cards that are in your wishlist.

wishlistadd.Description: Wishlists the stated card. To wishlist a SPECIAL card, add the following chareter at the start of the card name: "*" for the HOLO version, "[" for the special FRAMED version, and "{" for the HOLO FRAMED version.

unwishlist.Description: Unwishlists the stated card. To unwishlist a SPECIAL card, add the following chareter at the start of the card name: "*" for the HOLO version, "[" for the special FRAMED version, and "{" for the HOLO FRAMED version.

wishlistwatch.Description: Watches the current channel for cards in your wishlist and pings you when they are about to be pulled. This command can only be used in a pull channel.

buy.Description: Buys the item from the store. If an amount is specified it must start with a "x" to count. If an amount is not specified it buys one.

trade.Description: Trades two cards between two users. The other user must be refrenced using a mention.

gift.Description: Gift a card to another user. The other user must be refrenced using a mention.

multitrade.Description:
Trades any amount of cards or items between two users. The other user must be refrenced using a mention. 

Sending with the 3rd+ optional paramaters, it will add your items/cards listed. Each objects must be seperated by a comma. To list an amount of the item you must prefrace the number with a "x". 
**EX:** gmt @medibotEVE aa0000, aa0001, Draw 5 x2

help.Description: View this list of commands. Specify a command for detailed information.

bugreport.Description: Get the link for the bug report form.

claim.Description: Claims after maintenance gift. `50 POKEDOLLAR` for patch, `80 POKEDOLLAR` for update, `100 POKEDOLLAR` for hotfix.

daily.Description:
Claims a daily reward. Recieve `POKEDOLLARS` and `SHARDS`. 

Additionaly, a 20% chance for one random `GEM` and a 1% chance for one `GREAT BALL`. 

There is also a 5% chance your daily will become **Shiny**. **Shiny** dailys give x2 rewards and your chance to recive the rare rewards are increased.
